meanings.definition: A game in which geometric shapes called tetrominoes fall down a playing field.
meanings.sent1: In the tetri game, players must rotate and move tetrominoes to create solid lines.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy playing tetri on my phone during my break.
meanings.sent3: During the tetri game, the tetrominoes seemed to dance as they fell.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a chaotic tetri game, with pieces constantly dropping into place.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tetrominoes in tetri make the game visually appealing.

meanings.definition: A unit of Georgian currency, equal to one hundredth of a lari.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her lari for tetri to make smaller purchases.
meanings.sent2: The price of the item was just a few tetri, so I paid with coins.
meanings.sent3: He found a forgotten stash of tetri in an old jacket pocket.
meanings.sent4: In her wallet, the tetri gleamed like tiny treasures waiting to be spent.
meanings.sent5: The vendor handed back the change in colorful tetri coins.
